1366640.name: RPG Maker MZ - Essentials Set Z
1366640.description:
The Essentials Set Z for RPG Maker MZ is here to help with your new project! Create a more customized and original look in your game with this comprehensive add-on essential asset pack! With beautiful custom-made dungeon, interior and exterior tiles to create dangerous dungeons or wonderful outdoor fantasy settings and of course it also includes custom characters and monsters to fight and do battle for the right to conquer these domains!

Features:

Tiles: Outside sets / Inside sets / Dungeon sets
Enemies: 8 graphics
4 characters come with:
・Character: TV (walking sprite) and TVD
・Face
・Pictures (Bust-up image)
・SV animated battlers
For use with RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice!
